UPDATE reward r
r.reward_point = ( SELECT inv.reward FROM ( WITH reward AS ( SELECT 1000 reward, 70 percent FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 3000 , 20 FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 5000 , 5 FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 10000 , 5 FROM dual ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM reward r, ( SELECT level lv FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 100) WHERE percent >= lv ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 )inv )
